# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "VARIANT_ADC;VARIANT_USART;VARIANT_NUNCHUK;VARIANT_PPM;VARIANT_PWM;VARIANT_IBUS;VARIANT_HOVERCAR;VARIANT_HOVERBOARD;VARIANT_TRANSPOTTER;VARIANT_SKATEBOARD;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)

set(CLION_SVD_FILE_PATH "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/platforms/ststm32/misc/svd/STM32F103xx.svd" CACHE FILEPATH "Peripheral Registers Definitions File" FORCE)

SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/bin/arm-none-eabi-g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-rtti -fno-exceptions -g -ggdb -Os -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall -mthumb -mcpu=cortex-m3 -nostdlib")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-g -ggdb -Os -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -Wall -mthumb -mcpu=cortex-m3 -nostdlib")


if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "VARIANT_ADC")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50004')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F1')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'VARIANT_ADC')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=72000000L')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Inc")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Device/ST/STM32F1xx/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/STM32F1xx_HAL_Driver/Inc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/Common")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ak4343")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/cs43l22")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/hx8347d")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9320")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9325")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/lis302dl")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/spfd5408")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/st7735")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stlm75")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stmpe811")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/VARIANT_ADC/*.*
    )
endif()

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES

        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/VARIANT_HOVERCAR/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "VARIANT_HOVERBOARD")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50004')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F1')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'VARIANT_HOVERBOARD')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=72000000L')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Inc")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Device/ST/STM32F1xx/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/STM32F1xx_HAL_Driver/Inc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/Common")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ak4343")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/cs43l22")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/hx8347d")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9320")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9325")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/lis302dl")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/spfd5408")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/st7735")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stlm75")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stmpe811")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/VARIANT_HOVERBOARD/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "VARIANT_TRANSPOTTER")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50004')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F1')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'VARIANT_TRANSPOTTER')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=72000000L')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Inc")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Device/ST/STM32F1xx/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/STM32F1xx_HAL_Driver/Inc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/Common")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ak4343")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/cs43l22")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/hx8347d")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9320")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9325")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/lis302dl")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/spfd5408")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/st7735")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stlm75")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stmpe811")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/VARIANT_TRANSPOTTER/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "VARIANT_SKATEBOARD")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50004')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F1')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'STM32F103xE')
    add_definitions(-D'VARIANT_SKATEBOARD')
    add_definitions(-D'USE_HAL_DRIVER')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=72000000L')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Inc")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/CMSIS/Device/ST/STM32F1xx/Include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/STM32F1xx_HAL_Driver/Inc")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/Common")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ak4343")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/cs43l22")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/hx8347d")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9320")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/ili9325")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/lis302dl")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/spfd5408")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/st7735")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stlm75")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-stm32cube/f1/Drivers/BSP/Components/stmpe811")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include/c++/7.2.1/arm-none-eabi")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/7.2.1/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-gccarmnoneeabi/arm-none-eabi/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/VARIANT_SKATEBOARD/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
